::Prowl::

"I'm a military strategist," Prowl replies, "Although there's more of 
a need for warriors than strategists, and not to brag, but I make a 
fairly good warrior too."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Firedrill takes one last glance back towards his friends, then 
follows
> Prowl. "What rank do you hold? If you don't mind me asking." he 
asks.
